updates.description:
Design fixes
Added some new sounds

Zombie World Liberty: fixed bank reader (drop area)

Popups improvement

Accounts UI improvement

Added map - Zombie World Liberty

Player improvements

Zombie World Unity: increased max values for killz
Some design improvements

Some code improvements

Added Swarm Special Forces
Added account switcher
Bank cache improvements
Fixes, optimizations, sounds
